sources.main.js:
import { fetchRepos } from "./api.js"; import timeAgo from "./date.js"; const loadRepositories = (callbackAfterDomLoads) => { const payload = { username: "Adephil", count: 20 }; fetchRepos(payload).then(renderRepos); }; const renderRepos = (userData) => { const user = userData.data.user; const { id, repositories: { nodes: repos }, avatarUrl, twitterUsername, bio, name, } = user; const app = document.getElementById("app"); const headerTemplate = getHeaderTemplate(); const mainTemplate = getMainTemplate({ repos, avatarUrl, bio, name, twitterUsername, }); app.innerHTML = `${headerTemplate} ${mainTemplate}`; callbackAfterDomLoads(); }; const getRepoTemplate = (repo) => { const { name, url, resourcePath, forkCount, stargazerCount, licenseInfo, description, updatedAt, languages: { nodes: [lang], }, } = repo; return `

${name}

${ description ? `

${description}

` : "" }
${ lang ? `
${lang && lang.name}
` : "" } ${ stargazerCount ? `
2
` : "" } ${ forkCount ? `
25
` : "" } ${ licenseInfo ? `
${licenseInfo.key} License
` : "" }

Updated ${timeAgo( new Date(updatedAt) )}

 `; }; const getUserProfileTemplate = ({ avatarUrl, name, bio, twitterUsername }) => { return `

${name} Adephil

${bio || ""}
`; }; const getHeaderTemplate = () => { return `
Dashboard Pull Requests Issues Marketplace Explore   AdePhil   Sign out
New repository Import repository New gist New organization New project
Signed in as AdePhil
Your profile Your repository Your organizations Your enterprises Your projects Your stars Your gist
Feature Preview Help Settings Sign Out
`; }; const getMainTemplate = ({ repos, avatarUrl, bio, name, twitterUsername }) => { const reposTemplate = repos.map((repo) => getRepoTemplate(repo)).join(""); const userProfileTemplate = getUserProfileTemplate({ avatarUrl, bio, name, twitterUsername, }); return `
Overview Repositories65 Projects Packages
AdePhil
Overview Repositories65 Projects Packages
${userProfileTemplate}
    ${reposTemplate}
`; }; loadRepositories(callbackAfterDomLoads); function callbackAfterDomLoads() { //show mini profile const miniProfileCard = document.querySelector(".user-profile-sticky-bar"); window.addEventListener("scroll", function (e) { if (window.scrollY >= 420) { miniProfileCard.classList.add("show"); } else { miniProfileCard.classList.remove("show"); } }); // close all details on click outside const details = document.querySelectorAll("details"); // Add the onclick listeners. document.addEventListener("click", function () { details.forEach((detail) => { detail.removeAttribute("open"); }); }); //show mobile menu const menuButton = document.querySelector(".mobile-hamburger"); const menu = document.querySelector(".nav"); menuButton.addEventListener("click", function () { menu.classList.toggle("show"); }); }
